summary: This is an email chain from September 14, 2021, forwarding a Touhy request related to the Epstein case concerning an individual referred to as 'Lola Doe'. The request is sent by a paralegal from the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

persons.name: Maria Kelljchian
persons.context: She is the sender of the original email from Edwards Pottinger LLC, attaching and sending a Touhy request concerning 'Lola Doe' to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: He is copied on the original email from Maria Kelljchian, indicating his involvement with the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC and the Touhy request.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: She is copied on the original email from Maria Kelljchian, indicating her involvement with the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC and the Touhy request.

persons.name: Diane Cuddihy
persons.context: She is copied on the original email from Maria Kelljchian, indicating her involvement with the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC and the Touhy request.

connections.description: Both are part of the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC, as indicated by Maria copying Brad on the email.
Both are part of the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC, as indicated by Maria copying Brittany on the email.
Both are part of the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC, as indicated by Maria copying Diane on the email.

events.title: Touhy Request Submission for Lola Doe
events.description: A Touhy request (a request for testimony or documents from a federal employee) concerning an individual referred to as 'Lola Doe' is submitted by Edwards Pottinger LLC to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: 425 North Andrews Avenue, Suite 2, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301
keyFacts: A Touhy request related to the Epstein case was submitted on September 14, 2021, by the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC.
The request concerns an individual pseudonymously referred to as 'Lola Doe'.
The request was sent to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC, known for representing victims in the Epstein case, is actively involved in seeking information or testimony from federal officials.
